revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Monster | name = Peasant | class = Peasant6 | game = Strife | doomednum = 133 | convid = 11 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:StrifeHumanoid|StrifeHumanoid]]→[[Classes:Peasant|Peasant]]→Peasant6
A peasant with a red tunic. Appears as {{dw|Worner}} in MAP04: Power Station only. He is somewhat important in the story, as he gives you the ID card to the Power Station, so you can destroy the core. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Peasant6 : {{Class|Peasant}} { {{Property|Translation}} 0 {{Property|Speed}} 7 }
